Uses of Class
ScalarFilter

Uses of ScalarFilter in <Unnamed>
 

Subclasses of ScalarFilter in <Unnamed>
 class AverageFilter
          This #Filter subclass will filter by taking the inputs and calculating the average of previous inputs and that is the output.
 class BinomialFilter
          This class is a special class of the #FIRFilter where the input coefficients are the binomial distribution of from zero to a number N.
 class FIRFilter
          This class is a subclass of the #ScalarLinearFilter with a zero output coefficient parameter list.
 class PureGainFilter
          This class is a variant of the #FIRFilter that has an input coefficient list that is a single scalar number that will output a #Signal proportional to the input.
 class ScalarLinearFilter
          This class is the ScalarLinearFilter and is a subclass of the #ScalarFilter.
